The Butlerian Jihad is part of the Dune Saga, originally began by Frank Herbert, but continued by Brian Herbert and Kevin J Anderson. It does contain both polymorphism and quantum mechanics, in the form of the Tlielaxu Face Dancers and Guild navigators, respectively. Kind of ironic.
